fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Dark Green symbolizes transition, calmness, and freshness. Dark Green can visit a player to allow them to ignore the world around them, which causes all actions used on them to fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While Dark Green's effect is strong, it is not potent enough to block the effects of the same killer twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
